title: Is JavaScript really the wild west?
body: They told us that JavaScript is the wild west and you can do anything you want, but I'm not feeling the freedom. When did JavaScript methods start to feel like handy tools you can utilize to accomplish something, rather than difficult concepts to try and learn?

title: Databases are fun!
body: I love organizing things, and planning routes!

title: How to collaborate
body: What elements make up a dynamic collaborating team? How can I be a better collaborator?
